categories: Category:Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures books

nodes.text: Star Wars: Who's Who in the Galaxy: Character Storybook

Star Wars: Who's Who in the Galaxy: Character Storybook is a canon young-readers book in the Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures series that details the main characters from the first eight films of the Star Wars saga. It was written by Ella Patrick and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on July 16, 2019.

The galaxy is full of so many amazing heroes, villains, droids, aliens and creatures, it can be hard to keep them all straight! Thankfully, this delightful character storybook with simple text and illustrations guides readers through Episodes I-VIII by introducing all of the key players along the way.
